title: Eumig 8mm Film Splicer
brief_description: Eumig splicer in box with instruction booklet in German, Italian and English. This object was originally catalogued in the East Anglian Film Archive Donation with a Eumig P8 Projector (E000255) and Prora 8mm Editor Viewer. Catalogue entries separated.
